abstract: Carl C. Icahn, one of Yahoo‘s largest stockholders, has sold 12.7 million shares to whittle his holdings in the slumping Internet company down a percentage point to a 4.5 percent stake.
snippet: Carl C. Icahn, one of Yahoo‘s largest stockholders, has sold 12.7 million shares to whittle his holdings in the slumping Internet company down a percentage point to a 4.5 percent stake.
lead_paragraph: Carl C. Icahn, one of Yahoo‘s largest stockholders, has sold 12.7 million shares, reducing his stake in the slumping Internet company by a percentage point to 4.5 percent.

headline.main: Selling 12.7 Million Shares, Icahn Pares Yahoo Stake
